alert.note: Alert for Lander Foothills; Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 20 at 2:06PM MST until February 21 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 11 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches in the Wind River Basin; 2 to 4 inches in the Lander Foothills. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Upper Wind River Basin, Wind River Basin and Lander Foothills. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 11 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lander Foothills; Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Basin
